messages.game-start:
**Welcome to the Praetorium.**
This is the general chat channel and the primary platform for gameplay discussion. All players are able to see this channel.
messages.whisper-log:
**This is the Billboard.**

This channel is normally used for whispers, but since whispers are disabled in this game, this channel has become a secondary discussion channel. Players are advised to direct the purpose of this channel to suit their needs.
messages.mafia:
**This is the Mafia Chat.**

This channel is only open at night for members of the Mafia to communicate.
messages.opening-quote:
May lies and deceit distort the dimming truth;
for calamity is sowed from the seeds of rivalry.
messages.daytime-quote: **It is now daytime. The trial has now begun.**
messages.nighttime-quote: **Night has descended. This chat is now locked until Daytime starts. Remember to use your night actions if you intend to!**
messages.singular-lynch: :skull_crossbones: {;player}, chained, was forcefully laid out onto a guillotine in the middle of the townsquare. When an order was given, the guillotine blade fell, decapitating them. The crowd cheered in excitement and strung their head on the bridge with the other previously decapitated victims.
messages.plural-lynch: :skull_crossbones: {;players}, chained, were forcefully laid out onto guillotines in the middle of the townsquare. When an order was given, the guillotine blades fell synchronously, decapitating them. The crowd cheered in excitement and strung their head on the bridge with the other previously decapitated victims.
messages.abstain-lynch: **The Town has abstained on lynches for the day.**
messages.game-over:
**Game over!**

This channel is now open to everyone who has participated in the game.
